txt.en:
'Well met, [placeholder]. There is an air about you that hints at your experience. From your attire, I must assume that you are a Rune-keeper much like myself. If greater knowledge is what you seek, then I can help. First, however, I have a task for you.

'Ancient Rune-keepers used fine chisels to carve out their speech-craft in stone. The finest of these tools were made of mithril and were said to have power in their own right.

'One such chisel has been seen recently, and I think it appropriate that we reclaim this instrument to further your own abilities. There is an Orc, Folok, in the south-west portion of the Redhorn Lodes near Malmezel. Seek out this Orc and slay him; our scouts believe they have seen the chisel in his possession.'
'Excellent work, [placeholder].  \n\n'This is indeed a fine tool of dwarf-craft. Let us hope that it has not been fouled by its recent owner.'
The Orcs of Moria have looted many of the great treasures remaining in Moria after the fall of the dwarf-realm.
Talk to Márus at the Shadowed Refuge

Folok has been seen in the south-west portion of the Redhorn Lodes, near Malmezel, at the western edge of the Redhorn Lodes.\n\nMárus has asked you to defeat the Orc Folok and recover the mithril chisel.
Collect the mithril chisel from Folok
